biotools.summary: CLC-Pred (Cell Line Cytotoxicity Predictor) 2.0 is a web-service for in silico prediction of cytotoxic effect of chemical and natural compounds in non-transformed and cancer cell lines based on structural formula. CLC-Pred provides a prediction of the cytotoxicity of a compound to assess the relevance of the substance's inclusion in experimental screening.
